title: PATT Standard T&S Grant 2012 for Professor P Alexander and Dr S J George
abstractText: To provide deep 610 MHz polarisation observations of a sample of a well studied region ELAIS NI.
impactText: This award was a PATT travel grant in support of the wider aims of the Cambridge Astrophysics Group Consolidated Grant. The Impact was to facilitate publications using data obtained with this award.
findingsText: This award was a PATT travel grant in support of the wider aims of the Cambridge Astrophysics Group Consolidated Grant. The Impact was to facilitate publications using data obtained with this award. The results of the work directly funded will be directly relevant to other astronomers, but will add to the broader knowledge base in astronomy for which there is excellent public engagement and interest. Education,Culture, Heritage, Museums and Collections,Other
